channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway boosted Mitsubishi and Mitsui stakes. Why he’s enamored with Japan.
item.description: Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway has boosted its stake in Mitsubishi and Mitsui, further increasing a long-standing bet on Japanese trading houses.

item.title: Record levels of margin debt aren’t a red flag but long-term inflation is, says this fund manager
item.description: Margin debt levels won’t help traders time the next correction, says this fund manager but using options to hedge exposure can cushion some of the fal...

item.title: Think the S&P 500 is too expensive? Check out these ETFs instead.
item.description: Some investors are worried that the stock market is set up for a tech-driven decline.

item.title: CoreWeave’s stock has slumped. Here’s how the company can prove the bears wrong.
item.description: The AI-infrastructure company’s stock has been hammered on concerns over losses and debt. But CoreWeave is a “best-in-class” player whose shares could...

item.title: My friend, 61, signed a $20K contract for dental implants. She can’t afford it. Can she fight it?
item.description: “After her room and board is paid at the assisted-living home, she has $9,000 left for the year.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
